blocks.block_text: Listen to the alerts and instructions conveyed through media , radio or by the local authorities . Do not listen to rumours and do not spread rumours .
lines: Listen to the alerts and instructions conveyed through media , radio or by the local authorities . Do not listen to rumours and do not spread rumours .

blocks.block_text: Prepare an emergency kit for the family .
lines: Prepare an emergency kit for the family .

blocks.block_text: Know your family emergency plan and important telephone numbers .
lines: Know your family emergency plan and important telephone numbers .
